r.s: Graphical PEAR installer based on PHP-Gtk2
r.d: This program is a graphical frontend for PEAR, the PHP Extension and Application Repository. It uses PHP-Gtk2 as graphical toolkit and lets you easily browse available packages and install them on your computer. The program is designed to be by end-users, making it as easy as possible to install and uninstall programs.
r.n: * Include Checks.php when running with "pear -G", too (bug #7597)
